name: Salvation Army Asian American Yerba Buena
description:
Provides a food pantry. For seniors 60+ who live in 94103, 94105, or 94107 zip code.

ID required. Care providers must have client's ID with current address, their own ID, and authorization letter.

Pantry Hours:
Call for interview
Monday - Thursday
10:00am - 2:00pm

Food given out
Friday
9:00am - 10:30am
